const About = () => { return (

Our Story

We are a team of passionate art enthusiasts who started this gallery to promote and share the works of talented artists from around the world. Our mission is to create a platform where artists can showcase their talent and connect with art lovers.

Since our inception, we have organized various exhibitions and events to showcase the works of both emerging and established artists. Our gallery has become a hub for artists and art enthusiasts, and we are proud to have contributed to the growth of the art industry.

Our Team

  • Aishabibi Mugaidayeva - Founder and CEO
  • Jane Smith - Curator
  • Michael Brown - Marketing Manager
  • Sarah Johnson - Sales Manager
); }; export default About;
